The types of information and the purposes for which NUSO collects or processes personal information may include:

; we may automatically process your information to determine which products and services may be of most use to you.
From time to time, we may also use your information to contact you for market research purposes.
We may collect the following information:
We may use the information to customize the website according to your interests.
We may use the information to improve our products and services.
We only use this information for statistical analysis purposes and then the data is removed from the system.
What Information We Collect or Process via Our Mobile Applications

We provide Unified Communications (UCaaS), Contact Center (CCaaS), SIP Trunking, Collaboration, Video and Audio Conferencing, SMS and Mass Announcements, Call Recording, Infrastructure as a Service, Device as a Service, and Faxing solutions.

Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.
These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.
We use traffic log cookies to identify which pages are being used.
In the normal course of providing VoIP services to its users and customers, NUSO maintains and collects customer proprietary network information (CPNI).
We may at times use or disclose your CPNI for legal or regulatory reasons such as responding to a court order or to investigate fraud.

This helps us analyze data about web page traffic and improve our website in order to tailor it to customer needs.
We only use this information for statistical analysis purposes and then the data is removed from the system.

Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.
These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

We provide Unified Communications (UCaaS), Contact Center (CCaaS), SIP Trunking, Collaboration, Video and Audio Conferencing, SMS and Mass Announcements, Call Recording, Infrastructure as a Service, Device as a Service, and Faxing solutions.
A cookie in no way gives us access to your computer or any information about you, other than the data you choose to share with us.

We may also collect information about your visit, including pages you viewed or searched for, page response times, download errors, length of visits to certain pages, page interaction information (such as scrolling, clicks, and mouse-overs), methods used to browse away from the page, and any phone number used to call our customer service number.
We use this information for our internal analytics purposes and to improve the quality and relevance of our Websites to our visitors.
Personal Information collected through our Websites is generally collected and maintained solely by NUSO and/or its authorized partners.

We use the Personal Information you give us:

NUSO does not athis number with any other PII, and it cannot be directly or indirectly attributed to any person or persons; NUSO stores only the phone number and pertinent metadata so as to be compliant with all applicable state and federal laws, and NUSO does not share this data with any advertisers or third parties under any circumstances.
